nodes

类 SensorNodeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • nodes.SensorNodeComponent
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class SensorNodeComponent
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class SensorNodeComponent implements the sensor node component in the sensor network. ici,on garde les fonctions de changer ses propres valeurs des capteurs et de renvoyer les resultats aux clients Pour d'autre fonctions concernant les requetes de clients/nodes, on les delegue a NodePlugin

      • start

        public void start()
           throws fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.ComponentStartException
        从接口复制的说明: fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
        start the component; this method is automatically called by the component virtual machine after all components have been initialised and the component calls in turn its own inner components. Implementations of this method must always return the control.

        Contract

         pre     isInitialised()
 post    isStarted()
        指定者:
        start 在接口中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
        抛出:
        fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.ComponentStartException - to do.
        另请参阅:
        ComponentI.start()

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
        execute a task on the component after all components have been started; this method is automatically called by the component virtual machine after all components have been started and the component calls in turn its own inner components. Implementations of this method can keep the control as long as they wish (contrary to start) but they need to begin by a call to super if inner components also have an execute method to be called; it is the responsibility of programmers to make sure that this does not provoke deadlocks.

        Contract

         pre     isStarted()
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
        覆盖:
        execute 在类中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        另请参阅:
        ComponentI.execute()
